content.text:
# Draft:Crime in Boston during the 20th century

1900s
1910s
1916: Patriarca crime family founded
1920s
Prohibition
1930s
Prohibition
Gustin Gang
1940s
Donald Killeen and Killeen Gang
1950s
1950 Great Brink's Robbery
Mullen Gang begins activities
Charlestown Gang begins activities
1960s
Winter Hill Gang
Angiulo brothers begin activities
Campbell brothers bank robbery
Combat Zone
1965 Murder of Edward Deegan.
1966 Charlestown Gang ceases
1970s
Campbell brothers murder trial
Ping On begins activities.
Alvin Campbell sentence 1972
1974 Lady of the Dunes murder
1978 Blackfriars Massacre.
1980s
Alvin Campbell sentence 1980
Lenox Street Boys begin activities
Angiulo brothers end activities in mid 1980s
1990s
Isabella Stewart Gardner Museum theft
Boston Chinatown massacre
Murder of Carol Stuart
Lenox Street Boys
Bulger flees Boston, Weeks becomes head of Winter Hill Gang
Winter Hill Gang end of activities in 2000
Orchard Park Trailblazers
https://www.uscourts.gov/file/23118/download
See also
*Crime in Massachusetts
References
